sentences.sContent: It really irritates me when he doesn’t help around the house.
sentences.sCn: 家里的事情他一点都不帮忙，真让我恼火。

remMethod.val: irrit(痒) + ate → 激怒， 使烦躁

words.tran: 刺激的；气人的；使愤怒的
刺激的；刺激性的；使发怒的
[医] 刺激物，[医] 刺激剂
激怒；使…无效；使…兴奋（irritate的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 激怒， 使烦躁； 刺激
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel annoyed or impatient, especially by doing something many times or for a long period of time
